TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MenuItemStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class MenuItemStyle Inherits Style
public ref class MenuItemStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控件中一个菜单项的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a menu item in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类表示控件中菜单项的样式。 Use the class to represent the style of a menu item in the control. 菜单项显示在静态菜单或动态菜单中。A menu item is displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 静态菜单始终显示在控件中, 而动态菜单仅在用户将鼠标指针置于包含动态子菜单的父菜单项上时显示。A static menu is always displayed in a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 可以为每个不同的菜单项类型指定不同的样式特征 (如字体大小和颜色)。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different menu item types. 下表列出了可用的菜单项样式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|说明Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时, 动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前选定动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项上时该菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前选定的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 为静态菜单项设置了多个样式属性后, 将按以下顺序应用样式属性:When multiple style properties are set for a static menu item, the style properties are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或集合已定义, 此时将应用该集合或集合, 并重写其他菜单项样式属性。 If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义了集合, 则此时将应用该集合, 并覆盖其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 同样, 动态菜单项的样式属性将按以下顺序应用:Likewise, the style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或集合已定义, 此时将应用该集合或集合, 并重写其他菜单项样式属性。 If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定义了集合, 则此时将应用该集合, 并覆盖其他菜单项样式属性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. 类从类继承其大部分成员。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它通过提供控制菜单项文本周围空间量的属性, 以及相邻菜单项之间的空间, 来扩展类。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text, as well as the space between adjacent menu items. 使用属性可控制菜单项文本左侧和右侧的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同样, 属性控制菜单项文本上方和下方的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 您可以通过 设置属性来控制应用对象的菜单项与相邻菜单项之间的间距量。You can control the amount of spacing between the menu item that the object is applied to and its adjacent menu items by setting the property. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置从 、、和 返回的对象的样式属性,来控制控件中菜单项的外观。properties。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the menu items in a control by setting the style properties of the object returned from the , , , and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/CS/menuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyle/VB/menuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性复制到 类的当前实例中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可复制调用此方法的对象中指定对象的样式属性。 Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 类的当前实例中的所有属性都将替换为指定对象中的相应属性。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要在不替换任何设置值的情况下复制样式属性, 请使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法复制另一个对象的样式设置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style settings of another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/CS/menuitemstylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/VB/menuitemstylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单项文本左侧和右侧的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text.

value.span: 菜单项文本左侧和右侧的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) to the left and right of the menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制应用对象的菜单项的文本周围的水平空间量。 Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空间插入到文本左边缘和文本区域的边框之间以及文本右边缘和文本边框之间。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, and between the right edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制垂直间距, 请使用属性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将菜单项文本周围的水平间距按10个像素填充。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the horizontal spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/CS/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleHorizontalPadding/VB/menuitemstylehorizontalpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ItemSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.ItemSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用了 对象的菜单项与其相邻菜单项之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.

value.span: 应用了 对象的菜单项与其相邻菜单项之间的垂直间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of vertical spacing (in pixels) between the menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制应用对象的菜单项与同一级别上的相邻菜单项之间的垂直间距。 Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a menu item to which the object is applied and its adjacent menu items at the same level. 此空间插入当前菜单项的上边缘和上一菜单项的下边缘之间, 以及当前菜单项的下边缘和下一菜单项的上边缘之间的距离。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current menu item and the lower edge of the previous menu item, as well as between the lower edge of the current menu item and upper edge of the next menu item. > [!NOTE] > 不会为控件中的第一个菜单项呈现上部空间。The upper space is not rendered for the first menu item in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将菜单项与其相邻菜单项分隔5像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to separate a menu item from its adjacent menu items by 5 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/CS/menuitemstyleitemspacingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleItemSpacing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleItemSpacing/VB/menuitemstyleitemspacingvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The to combine settings with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性与 类的当前实例的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将指定对象的样式属性与从中调用此方法的对象的样式属性组合在一起。 Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法通过设置当前对象中未设置的每个属性及其在指定对象中的相应值来联接样式属性。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 仅更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果未设置指定对象中的属性, 则不会更改当前对象中的相应属性。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将类的当前实例的样式设置与另一个对象组合在一起。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style settings of the current instance of the class with another object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/CS/menuitemstylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleMergeWith/VB/menuitemstylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将 类的当前实例返回到其原始状态。

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从状态袋中移除任何已定义的样式元素, 并将对象重置为其原始状态。 Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将当前对象返回到其原始状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the current object to its original state. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/CS/menuitemstylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemStyleCopyFrom/VB/menuitemstylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单项文本上方和下方的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a menu item's text.

value.span: 菜单项文本上方和下方的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) above and below a menu item's text.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制应用对象的菜单项的文本周围的垂直空间量。 Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the menu item to which the object is applied. 此空间插入到文本的上边缘和文本区域的边框之间以及文本的下边缘和文本边框之间。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the text's border. 若要控制水平间距, 请使用属性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将菜单项文本周围的垂直间距填充10个像素。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the vertical spacing around the text of a menu item by 10 pixels.
